items.title: Death toll rises to four after Michigan church shooting and arson attack
items.description: The attacker drove a vehicle into the church during a service and opened fire, before being killed himself.

items.title: South Sudan court rejects ex-VP's bid to halt murder and treason trial
items.description: The special court rules that Riek Machar is not immune from prosecution and it can put him on trial.

items.title: Army sent to battle fire in Namibia tourist hotspot
items.description: Etosha National Park is home to endangered black rhinos and more than 100 diverse mammal species.

items.title: The Indian superstar whose political rally turned fatal for dozens
items.description: At least 40 people died over the weekend in a crowd crush at a political rally organised by Vijay's party.

items.title: Torrential weather hits Valencia region year after deadly floods
items.description: The Spanish area where 230 people were killed in 2024 has been struck again by bad weather.
